mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "userId", a.win_count AS "winCount", a.win_from_date AS "winFromDate", a.win_to_date AS "winToDate", a.win_dates AS "winDates", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.select:
select * from (select row_.*, rownum as "order" from (select * from (select au.nick_name as "nickName", au.portrait as "portrait", b.user_id , nvl(b."win_count", 0) as "winCount", u.create_time as "registTime" from (select a.user_id, max(a.win_count) as "win_count" from act_guess_win_51 a
group by a.user_id) b left join act_guess_user u on b.user_id = u.user_id left join acc_user au on b.user_id = au.user_id) order by "winCount" desc,"registTime" asc) row_ ) WHERE user_id=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO act_guess_win_51( user_id, win_count, win_from_date, win_to_date, win_dates, create_time, remark ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{winCount}, #{winFromDate}, #{winToDate}, #{winDates}, #{createTime}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE act_guess_win_51 SET win_count = #{winCount}, win_from_date = #{winFromDate}, win_to_date = #{winToDate}, win_dates = #{winDates}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id}
